name: Orbital Descent
description:
Orbital Descent is a student game developed by Ian Richardson, Jackson Brazeal, and Ilda Lara Aguilar at UC Santa Cruz. You play as an astronaut in a near-future space elevator. After an unexpected meteor shower hits the Global Astro Research Center atop the elevator, an alien test subject has escaped and is descending the elevator to Earth. You must avoid the debris from the space station above and navigate your way lower and lower to stop the creature before it's too late.

This game is intended to be played at 60hz refresh rate.
